## Files.FileSystem.loadJsonPuzzlesFileSync() function

Loads an arbitrary JSON file and parses it to return a validated [IPuzzlesFile](./ts-sudoku-lib.files.model.ipuzzlesfile.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function loadJsonPuzzlesFileSync(path: string): Result<IPuzzlesFile>;
```
